hotels.title: Swiss Alpine Chalet in Heritage Town of Grindelwald with Eiger Views & Five Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Capture the snow-capped peaks, verdant plains and glacial waters of the Swiss Alps with an escape to Romantik Hotel Schweizerhof, a charming 19th-century chalet in the popular village of Grindelwald. With a focus on preserving tradition, you can enjoy a traditional Swiss fondue and hearty plates at the variety of onsite restaurants, before retiring to your room after a day of exploration. In snow or sunshine, be enchanted by postcard-worthy vistas and the old-world charm of this gorgeous hotel.
